text: Lam sao (co the co mot hiep uoc) khi ma, neu chung gianh đuoc quyen thong tri đoi voi cac nguoi thi chung se chang them coi trong cac nguoi ve moi quan he ho hang hay hiep uoc đuoc ky ket? Chung chi lam hai long cac nguoi bang mieng mom cua chung con long da cua chung thi khong he. That vay, đa so bon chung la nhung ke day loan, bat tuan
